title: Some ministers also trying to grab IDH land: Sirisena
content: DM Online – By Sandun A. Jayasekera Health Minister Maithripala Sirisena yesterday charged that some elements including certain ministers were attempting to grab valuable state land belonging to the Mulleriyawa Infectious Diseases Hospital (IDH) and he had to wage a war to protect these lands. The Minister made this hard-hitting allegation when he visited the…
